-&gniScEqdaM ka#riShyathaH || 
dRu(gm)ha#sva dEvi pRuthivi svaqstaya# AsuqrI mAqyA svaqdhayA# kRuqtA&si# | 
juShTa#M dEqvAnA#miqdama#stu haqvyamari#ShTAq tvamudi#hi yaqj~jE aqsminn || 
mitraiqtAmuqKAM ta#paiqShA mA BE#di | 
EqtAM tEq pari# dadAqmyaBi#ttyai || 
dr^^va#nnaH saqrpirA#sutiH praqtnO hOtAq varE$NyaH | 
saha#saspuqtrO adBu#taH || 
para#syAq adhi# saqM~MvatO&va#rA(gm) aqByA - [  ] 36
